blacklistPlaceholder.message: One URL each line in the format of www.youku.com or youku.com

spacing.message: Add a halfwidth space between Chinese character and alphabet/number

spaceBetweenFullwidthPunctuationAndAlpha.message: Allow unnecessary halfwidth space between fullwidth punctuation and alphabet/number

replaceWithCornerQuotes.message: Replace the following mark with corner quotes

halfwidthParenthesisAroundNumbers.message: Replace fullwidth brackets around numbers with halfwidth ones
